sentence: The staff here was vey friendly and accommodating the valet staff was helpful and attentive
At the end we were all hugs with the staff the suite was very spacious
This hotel was very clean and the staff was friendly and helpful
The hotel staff was very friendly helpful
Free cookies at checkin are amazing
Staff gave me great advise about third party booking type sites
I also noticed that everyone from the valet to the front desk to housekeeping was friendly helpful up beat
Staff was Super friendly and exceedingly helpful
Excellent place to stay centrally located to many great restaurants and the staff here are very friendly
The valet service and front desk staff were very excellent and helpful
Receptionists do not know the floor plan positive interpretation or make it their goal to give you what you did not ask for negative interpretation
Service was friendly although we did have to wait quite a while to check in due to a line and only one person seemed to be at the desk
Building alarms went off three times during our stay but that is really out of the control of the staff
There was an issue with loud high scholers late at night and the front desk resolved the issue quickly and efficiently
The only thing I did not like was the price of room service that was way to high other then that I would recommend this place to you
Everything was great except there was only 2 elevators for the staff and guest
The reception staff where fantastic my little boy lost his bear which we could n’t find and he was clearly upset

so we just somehow worked it into the conversation late evening when we returned a guy showed up at our door with cake saying they heard it was our anniversary nothing in which by us was planned well worth the stay with all the amenities and service
The in hotel starbucks needs some improvements and training for staff
Lastly the cleaning staff did not clean room garbage etc
Enjoyed the in house bar but did nt partake at the restaurant even though full service was offered for additional cost
